title: Isomorphic objects
content: In this subsection, the "is isomorphic to" relation between objects of a category ` ~=c ` is defined (see ~ df-cic ). It is shown that this relation is an equivalence relation, see ~ cicer .

blocks.name: ccic
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the category isomorphism relation.

blocks.name: df-cic
blocks.content: Function returning the set of isomorphic objects for each category ` c ` . Definition 3.15 of [Adamek] p. 29. Analogous to the definition of the group isomorphism relation ` ~=g ` , see ~ df-gic . (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: cicfval
blocks.content: The set of isomorphic objects of the category ` c ` . (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cicfval(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wceq(cfv(ccic, c0), co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls)))
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, ccic, c0, co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls), ccat, co(cfv(ciso, cv(hs0)), csupp, emptycls), universe, wcel(c0, ccat))
  df-cic(hs0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, ccat), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cfv(ciso, cv(hs0)), csupp, emptycls), co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls)))
  oveq1d(cfv(ciso, cv(hs0)), csupp, emptycls, cfv(ciso, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ciso)
  id(wcel(c0, ccat))
  ovexd(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls, wcel(c0, ccat))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls))
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ccat))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cicfval(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Cat ‚Üí(‚â° ` c0)=((Iso ` c0)[supp]‚àÖ))
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, ccic, c0, ((Iso ` c0)[supp]‚àÖ), ccat, ((Iso ` hs0)[supp]‚àÖ), universe, c0 ‚àà Cat)
  df-cic(hs0)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Cat, hs0 = c0, ((Iso ` hs0)[supp]‚àÖ)=((Iso ` c0)[supp]‚àÖ))
  oveq1d((Iso ` hs0), csupp, emptycls, (Iso ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ciso)
  id(c0 ‚àà Cat)
  ovexd((Iso ` c0), csupp, emptycls, c0 ‚àà Cat)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(((Iso ` c0)[supp]‚àÖ))
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà Cat)
}

blocks.name: brcic
blocks.content: The relation "is isomorphic to" for categories. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm brcic(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2), wne(co(c0, c3, c2), emptycls)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciso, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2), wne(co(c0, c3, c2), emptycls), wbr(c0, co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls)))
  breqd(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2, co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(ccic, c1), co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls)), wcel(c1, ccat))
  cicfval(c1)
  a1i(w0, wb(wbr(c0, co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls))))
  df-br(c0, co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls), c2)
  3bitr3rd(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls)), wne(co(c0, c3, c2), emptycls), wne(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls), wne(cfv(cfv(ciso, c1), cop(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  neeq1d(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls, cfv(cfv(ciso, c1), cop(c0, c2)), w0)
  fveq1d(c3, cop(c0, c2), cfv(ciso, c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(ciso, c1)))
  neeq1d(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls, co(c0, c3, c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2)))
  eqcomi(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), co(c0, c3, c2))
  df-ov(c0, c3, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wne(cfv(cfv(ciso, c1), cop(c0, c2)), emptycls), wcel(cop(c0, c2), co(cfv(ciso, c1), csupp, emptycls))), wcel(cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)), universe), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), wfn(cfv(ciso, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  xpexd(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), universe, universe, w0)
  fvexd(cbs, c1, w0)
  opelxpd(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  syl6eleq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), c4, w0)
  syl6eleq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wfn(cfv(ciso, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(c1, ccat))
  isofn(c1)
  fvn0elsuppb(cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)), universe, cop(c0, c2), cfv(ciso, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brcic(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(‚â° ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî(c0[c3]c2)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Iso ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, c0[(‚â° ` c1)]c2, (c0[c3]c2)‚â† ‚àÖ, c0[((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ)]c2, < c0, c2 > ‚àà((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ))
  breqd(c0, (‚â° ` c1), c2, ((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ), w0)
  syl(w0, (‚â° ` c1)=((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ), c1 ‚àà Cat)
  cicfval(c1)
  a1i(w0, (c0[((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ)]c2 ‚Üî < c0, c2 > ‚àà((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ)))
  df-br(c0, ((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ), c2)
  3bitr3rd(w0, < c0, c2 > ‚àà((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ), (c0[c3]c2)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c3 ` < c0, c2 >)‚â† ‚àÖ, ((Iso ` c1)` < c0, c2 >)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  neeq1d((c3 ` < c0, c2 >), emptycls, ((Iso ` c1)` < c0, c2 >), w0)
  fveq1d(c3, < c0, c2 >, (Iso ` c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, c3 =(Iso ` c1))
  neeq1d((c3 ` < c0, c2 >), emptycls, (c0[c3]c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, (c3 ` < c0, c2 >)=(c0[c3]c2))
  eqcomi((c3 ` < c0, c2 >), (c0[c3]c2))
  df-ov(c0, c3, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, (((Iso ` c1)` < c0, c2 >)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üî < c0, c2 > ‚àà((Iso ` c1)[supp]‚àÖ)), ((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1))‚àà ùïå, < c0, c2 > ‚àà((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1)), (Iso ` c1)[Fn]((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1)))
  xpexd((Base ` c1), (Base ` c1), universe, universe, w0)
  fvexd(cbs, c1, w0)
  opelxpd(c0, c2, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c1), w0)
  syl6eleq(c0, (Base ` c1), c4, w0)
  syl6eleq(c2, (Base ` c1), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, (Iso ` c1)[Fn]((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1)), c1 ‚àà Cat)
  isofn(c1)
  fvn0elsuppb(((Base ` c1)√ó(Base ` c1)), universe, < c0, c2 >, (Iso ` c1))
}

blocks.name: cic
blocks.content: Objects ` X ` and ` Y ` in a category are isomorphic provided that there is an isomorphism ` f : X --> Y ` , see definition 3.15 of [Adamek] p. 29. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cic(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c3, c2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciso, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl6bb(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c3, c2))), wne(co(c0, c3, c2), emptycls))
  brcic(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  n0(s0, co(c0, c3, c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c3, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cic(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(‚â° ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Iso ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl6bb(w0, c0[(‚â° ` c1)]c2, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2)), (c0[c3]c2)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  brcic(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  n0(s0, (c0[c3]c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: brcici
blocks.content: Prove that two objects are isomorphic by an explicit isomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm brcici(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciso, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, co(c0, c3, c2)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c3, c2))))
  sylc(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c3, c2))), wcel(c5, co(c0, c3, c2)), wcel(c5, co(c0, c3, c2)))
  spcegv(hs0, c5, co(c0, c3, c2), wcel(c5, co(c0, c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c3, c2)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c5, co(c0, c3, c2))
  cic(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c5, co(c0, c3, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brcici(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[(‚â° ` c1)]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Iso ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Cat)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[(‚â° ` c1)]c2, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2)))
  sylc(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2)), c5 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2), c5 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2))
  spcegv(hs0, c5, (c0[c3]c2), c5 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2), hs0 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2))
  eleq1(hs0, c5, (c0[c3]c2))
  cic(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(c5 ‚àà(c0[c3]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

ciclcl
blocks.content: Isomorphism implies the left side is an object. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ciclcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wbr(c1, cfv(ccic, c0), c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, ccat), wbr(c1, cfv(ccic, c0), c2), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, ccat), wbr(c1, cfv(ccic, c0), c2), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wbr(c1, co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls), c2))
  breqd(c1, cfv(ccic, c0), c2, co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls), wcel(c0, ccat))
  cicfval(c0)
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, ccat), wbr(c1, co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls), c2), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(cop(c1, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wne(cfv(cfv(ciso, c0), cop(c1, c2)), emptycls)))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, ccat), wb(wbr(c1, co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls), c2), wa(wcel(cop(c1, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wne(cfv(cfv(ciso, c0), cop(c1, c2)), emptycls))), wfn(cfv(ciso, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), universe), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  isofn(c0)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  sqxpexg(cfv(cbs, c0), universe)
  a1i(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  syl5bb(w3a(wfn(cfv(ciso, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), universe), wcel(emptycls, universe)), wbr(c1, co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls), c2), wa(wcel(cop(c1, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wne(cfv(cfv(ciso, c0), cop(c1, c2)), emptycls)), wcel(cop(c1, c2), co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls)))
  df-br(c1, co(cfv(ciso, c0), csupp, emptycls), c2)
  elsuppfn(cfv(ciso, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), universe, emptycls, universe, cop(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(cop(c1, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wne(cfv(cfv(ciso, c0), cop(c1, c2)), emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  opelxp1(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
}

  syl3anc(c0 ‚àà Cat, (c1[((Iso ` c0)[supp]‚àÖ)]c2 ‚Üî(< c1, c2 > ‚àà((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß((Iso ` c0)` < c1, c2 >)‚â† ‚àÖ)), (Iso ` c0)[Fn]((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)), ((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àà ùïå, ‚àÖ ‚àà ùïå)
  isofn(c0)
  mp1i(c0 ‚àà Cat, ((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àà ùïå, (Base ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  sqxpexg((Base ` c0), universe)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà Cat, ‚àÖ ‚àà ùïå)
  0ex()
  syl5bb(((Iso ` c0)[Fn]((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àà ùïå ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà ùïå), c1[((Iso ` c0)[supp]‚àÖ)]c2, (< c1, c2 > ‚àà((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚àß((Iso ` c0)` < c1, c2 >)‚â† ‚àÖ), < c1, c2 > ‚àà((Iso ` c0)[supp]‚àÖ))
  df-br(c1, ((Iso ` c0)[supp]‚àÖ), c2)

  opelxp1(c1, c2, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0))
}

  isofn(c0)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe))

blocks.content: Isomorphism is an equivalence relation on objects of a category. Remark 3.16 in [Adamek] p. 29. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2020.)
